summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of 2nd Avenue South from South Holden Street to South Fontanelle Street; and certain other streets; by asphaltic paving; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25805 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of Payment of Bonds.
